FEATURES 

The game Castlevania: Lords of Shadow - Mirror of Fate awaits familiar from 
previous games Castlevania series action, but this time will be added to a platform 
gameplay and 3D-graphics. Players will explore the castle Dracula and its surrounding 
territory; find relics that will help improve your ability; battle with horrible monsters. 
Tricky puzzles, devious traps, meetings with the nightmarish bosses - all this you have 
to go to defeat Dracula himself! 


Installation:


1 Install the setup.exe 
2 Copy the content of the folder NoDVD to game installation folder
3 Play
